title: Robot-Assisted Interactive English Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic English vocabulary and sentence structure
context.additional_context: Natural English learning environment through robot interaction, utilizing personal devices in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize over 50 basic English expressions through daily conversation simulations with robots
Learners can create creative English presentation materials using robots when performing project-based tasks
Learners improve their English learning motivation by over 30% through robot interaction activities (based on pre- and post-survey evaluations).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
